fields.title: Find, Recruit and Follow-up Support
fields.description: This website will enable researchers and life sciences companies to understand and navigate the emerging landscape around Find, Recruit and Follow-up Services and to make more informed and timely choices about which services to use and what logistical, legal and financial implications are involved.
fields.serviceDescriptionFind: Identifying potential numbers of participants to support the planning of appropriate placement of studies in the UK.
fields.serviceDescriptionRecruit: Enabling individuals identified by data analysis to be approached about taking part in research.
fields.serviceDescriptionFollowUp: Collecting participant specific events and outcomes by matching to existing data sets.
fields.signPostDescription1: Need help finding appropriate data services, or any other part of the UK journey to getting your study started? The UK offers multiple services and teams of professionals who can support you.
fields.signPostDescription2: If you provide services that support Find, Recruit or Follow-up activties and would be interested in inclusion within this website, we would love to hear from you.

error.message: The query you sent was invalid. Probably a filter or ordering specification is not applicable to the type of a field.
